column5: Our place is for Family and Friends to be able to stay together close to Lake Buchanan. Boat dock is 3 houses away. We have a park lake front around corner. You can drive up road to Canyon of Eagles park to fish and rent boats as well. This is the COUNTRY so you will see spiders, Bugs and flying insects.  *NO PARTIES *No Pets* No Smoking* PLEASE Enjoy yourself!!
